weirdItems.name: Dog Dryer
weirdItems.details: Having a dog dry itself off all over your living room post-bath is rarely ideal. Fortunately, there's a bizarre blow-dryer suit out there that can help keep your pup from dripping all over the house.

weirdItems.name: Pizza Hat
weirdItems.details: Finally, you can indulge in everyone's life-long desire of wearing pizza atop their head. Beware the sprinkled parmesan as you nod or shake your head, thoughâ€”some might mistake it for dandruff.

weirdItems.name: Baby Mop
weirdItems.details: It's never too early to teach your children about chores, as evidenced by this suit that lets your baby mop the house for you.

weirdItems.name: Fish Pencil Case
weirdItems.details: Not every kid is eager to go to school with a Hello Kitty pencil case. Sometimes, you just want to stick your writing instruments into the belly of a very realistic-looking fish.

weirdItems.name: Nicolas Cage Pillow
weirdItems.details: The only thing better than a festive red sparkly pillowcase is one that morphs into Nicolas Cage's face with the satisfying swipe of your hand.
